summary: Completed comprehensive testing of multi-parcelle PROPRIETAIRE functionality. All 15 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend tests verified multi-parcelle navigation, active state highlighting, profile badge display, and surveillance button functionality.
passed_tests: Backend: API /api/documents/get-owner-parcelles returns is_multi_parcelle=true for multi-parcelle code
Backend: API returns correct parcelle_count (3) and parcelle list for DJ9MFX7J code
Backend: Profile verification returns profile_type=PROPRIETAIRE with can_access_surveillance=true
Backend: Profile verification works for all 3 linked parcelles (tf-223737, tf-223738, tf-223740)
Backend: Profile verification correctly rejects unlinked parcelle (tf-223741)
Backend: Surveillance access granted for PROPRIETAIRE with camera_enabled
Backend: Multi-parcelle code creation via /api/admin/access-codes works correctly
Backend: Access codes list includes parcelle_configs for multi-parcelle codes
Backend: PROSPECT profile correctly shows show_watermark=true and can_access_surveillance=false
Backend: Surveillance access correctly denied for PROSPECT profile
Frontend: Multi-parcelle navigation section 'Vos propriétés (3)' displays after code verification
Frontend: Profile badge shows 'Propriétaire vérifié' with 'Accès permanent'
Frontend: Active parcelle has amber background (bg-amber-500)
Frontend: Non-active parcelles have default styling (bg-white/5)
Frontend: Clicking parcelle navigation button loads new parcelle info without closing sidebar
Frontend: Active state correctly switches when clicking different parcelle
Frontend: Surveillance en Direct button displays for PROPRIETAIRE with camera access
Frontend: Surveillance dialog opens with LIVE badge and video player controls

test_credentials.multi_parcelle_proprietaire_code: DJ9MFX7J (Jean Dupont - linked to tf-223737, tf-223738, tf-223740)

seed_data_creation: Multi-parcelle code DJ9MFX7J was already created by main agent with 3 parcelles and camera access enabled
context_for_next_testing_agent: Multi-parcelle functionality fully tested. The code DJ9MFX7J is a PROPRIETAIRE code linked to 3 parcelles (tf-223737, tf-223738, tf-223740) with camera access enabled for all. The surveillance video URL is a placeholder (https://example.com/stream) so video won't actually play. Backend uses JSON file storage (/app/backend/data/parcelles.json) - not a real database.

mocked_components.database: JSON file storage (/app/backend/data/parcelles.json) - MOCKED, not real MongoDB
mocked_components.surveillance_video: Video URL is placeholder (https://example.com/stream) - MOCKED, no real video stream

features_verified.multi_parcelle_navigation: Working - displays 3 parcelles with correct names and superficies
features_verified.active_parcelle_highlighting: Working - amber background for active, default for others
features_verified.parcelle_switching: Working - sidebar updates with new parcelle info, code persists
features_verified.profile_badge: Working - shows 'Propriétaire vérifié' with crown emoji and 'Accès permanent'
features_verified.surveillance_button: Working - displays for PROPRIETAIRE with camera access, opens video dialog
features_verified.surveillance_dialog: Working - shows LIVE badge, video player controls, security notice
